name: Deep Into Work
description:
The game is set inside a submarine, at the end of World War 2. The player is a soldier, stuck inside the submarine, which is damaged and stationary at the bottom of the ocean. 

Our protagonist will have to maintain his daily routine in order to keep the submarine intact, but strange things keep happening around him.

FEATURES LIST:

  • Exploration
  • Puzzles
  • Atmosphere

DEVELOPED BY:

MAJESTIC SUSHI

(EVENT HORIZON SCHOOL MILAN, YEAR 1, 2021/2022)
